Job Description: Join a dynamic digital analytics team to conduct research and development of communications strategies to micro-target key audiences for recruitment and retention of employees. This position will play a supporting role in implementing a data-driven approach to inform the companys marketing efforts. The intern should be able to quickly to learn analytic tools and be curious about how data drives communication strategies.  Job responsibilities may include, but are not limited to: digital monitoring and analysis of influencers and key topics, assisting with production of materials and reports, and partnering with teammates to drive talent acquisition campaigns by converting data into actionable insights. Additionally, the Digital Analytics Intern will spend time conducting and supporting research projects, organizing content assets, as well as database management.  For Multi-Level Intern Requisitions:  This position can be a Salary Grade of G04, G05 or NUG based on the candidate's qualifications as they relate to the skills, experience and responsibility requirements for the position.
